summary:
I always look for ways to improve the quality of my work, and to remain consistent. I enjoy even the most menial tasks, as they can provide stability and order in a world otherwise ravaged by discord and chaos. 

I used to be employed at the e-mail department of an outsourcing company, where I worked as a customer service employee. There, I enjoyed focusing fastidiously on guiding customers to resolve issues with purchases they made in an online environment. I did so through the use of clear grammar, correct use of terminology, meticulous attention to spelling, and logical organization of relevant information.

I've also done some freelance work as a translator for Ziggurat Taaltrainingen, which I found to be satisfying. Moreover, all clients were satisfied with my work. Aside from that, I occasionally wrote video game reviews for Cubed3.com.

I would like to fill the role of customer service employee, preferably on an e-mail or social media department. Some other roles I would consider are: revisor, translator, editor, or language trainer.
